function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Covid-19 pandemic as a global health crisis","Impact":"Loss of lives and disruption of daily life","Mitigation":"Vaccination, public health measures, and testing","Technologies":"Vaccine development, testing kits, digital contact tracing","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, global health agencies"},{"Description":"Rise in global greenhouse gas emissions","Impact":"Contribution to climate change and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Transition to renewable energy, carbon neutrality goals, and emission reduction regulations","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage, energy-efficient systems","People":"Global population, future generations","Owner":"Governments, corporations, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Potential impact of pandemic on sustainable energy transitions","Impact":"Disruption of sustainable energy initiatives and climate action goals","Mitigation":"Incorporating green recovery plans, reevaluating energy strategies, and investing in resilient energy systems","Technologies":"Smart grid technology, renewable energy infrastructure, energy storage solutions","People":"Global population, energy sector stakeholders","Owner":"Governments, energy corporations, sustainability organizations"}]}
